name: relayx-webjs
description: A powerful library for integrating real-time communication into your webapps, powered by the Relay Network.

scripts.test: set -o allexport && source .env && set +o allexport && NODE_ENV=test node tests/test.js
scripts.test:queue: set -o allexport && source .env && set +o allexport && NODE_ENV=test node tests/test_queue.js
scripts.test:kv: set -o allexport && source .env && set +o allexport && NODE_ENV=test node tests/test_kv.js

author: Relay
